items.name: GitHubSaver
items.description: Class using the GitHub library for C# that holds the connection and credentials. It is not tested enought! Be carefull

items.name: GoogleDriveService
items.description: Use of Google's Standar library for C# to retrieve and upload files to a certain Google Drive account. IT HAS NOT BEEN TESTED

items.name: NetworkUtils
items.description: A series of functions that may be usefull for creating apps that connect's to servers, for example: knowing if the machine has access to internet, or parsing ip values

items.name: ImageManager
items.description: Exclusively made for WPF, a system that tries to load in cache any Image Source, so that having multiple instances of the same image doesn't eat as much memory as it could

items.name: AutoSaver
items.description: Static class that triggers a given function every X seconds. Can be used to make an autosaver.

items.name: FileTracker
items.description: Class made for Windows OS to track an specific folder in search of new files, renames, deleted files, and any other type of change you may encounter inside the folder

items.name: LocalBackupHandler
items.description: An easy class for creating and retrieven backup files for any kind of proyect you may need

items.name: LocalDataManager
items.description: Static class with functions to convert to Json and retrieve the values given. Also, It includes a function for FlowDocuments in WPF

items.name: ComplexTimer
items.description: A generic and extensible timer that operates on any numeric-like type supporting arithmetic and comparison, allowing precise control over progression, lifecycle events, and looping behavior beyond simple time-based use cases.

items.name: MultipleObjectPool
items.description: Class made for proyects in Unity to handle multiple object pooling with infinite expanding of the pools depending of the object's demand

items.name: SimpleTimer
items.description: A lightweight frame-based timer that increments or decrements a float value using a fixed or dynamically retrieved step, optionally looping and invoking a callback when reaching a target value.

items.name: Logger
items.description: Standar implementation of a Logger class, that can retrieve and store exceptions that may ocurr on production place, so that you, the developer, can know what the heck just happened
